Index » ServiceContainer

Class: ServiceContainer

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\DependencyInjection\ServiceContainer.coffee

Overview

ServiceContainer injects services in a container accessible on an application

Author:

  • Jessym Reziga jessym@konsserto.com

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) setupKernel() Setting up the Kernel configurations
  • # (void) setupGlobalAndBundles() Setting up the global and bundles configurations
  • # (void) addServiceInstance(services, type = null) Create the services instance a unique time
  • # (void) compile(service) Compile the service passed in parameter
  • # (void) updateForInjectors() Bound Check if old services (with args) need dependencies from latest registered services /!\ For Kernel purpose only !
  • # (void) inject(serviceDefinition, value) Bound Inject a service manually => Need to updateForInjectors after /!\ For Kernel purpose only !
  • # (Object) get(name, debug = true) Bound Get service by name
  • # (Boolean) has(name) Bound Check if a service exists
  • # (ServiceDefinition) getServiceDefinition(name) Bound Get the service definition
  • # (ServiceInstance) getServiceInstance(name) Bound Get the service instance
  • # (void) set(name, value, args = []) Set a service instance

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(kernel)

Class constructor

Parameters:

  • kernel ( Kernel ) — The kernel of Konsserto

Instance Method Details

# (void) setupKernel()

Setting up the Kernel configurations

# (void) setupGlobalAndBundles()

Setting up the global and bundles configurations

# (void) addServiceInstance(services, type = null)

Create the services instance a unique time

Parameters:

  • services ( Object ) — Liste of the services to create and instanciate only one time
  • type ( String ) — Type of the service (like global), default is null

# (void) compile(service)

Compile the service passed in parameter

Parameters:

  • service ( ServiceInstance ) — The service instance to compile

# (void) updateForInjectors() Bound

Check if old services (with args) need dependencies from latest registered services /!\ For Kernel purpose only !

# (void) inject(serviceDefinition, value) Bound

Inject a service manually => Need to updateForInjectors after /!\ For Kernel purpose only !

Parameters:

  • serviceDefinition ( ServiceDefinition ) — The service definition to instanciate

# (Object) get(name, debug = true) Bound

Get service by name

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the service to return
  • debug ( Boolean ) — Should I use debug mode ? default is true

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — The service concerned

# (Boolean) has(name) Bound

Check if a service exists

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the service to check

Returns:

  • ( Boolean ) — True if exists, false in the other cases

# (ServiceDefinition) getServiceDefinition(name) Bound

Get the service definition

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the service to find

Returns:

  • ( ServiceDefinition ) — The service definition or null

# (ServiceInstance) getServiceInstance(name) Bound

Get the service instance

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the service to find

Returns:

  • ( ServiceInstance ) — The service instance or null

# (void) set(name, value, args = [])

Set a service instance

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — The name of the service
  • value ( Object ) — The value to inject in the ServiceDefinition
  • args ( Object ) — The args to inject in the ServiceDefinition
